debutant.description: Drive the ball mostly upward, dissipating the ball's speed by sending it upwards. Sink the ball into the sponge at an angle so you can spin it with both topspin and sidespin.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice counter-looping after a lob, using the spin and speed of the incoming ball to attack back.

metriques_progression: Return a certain number of lobs in a row

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Don't lob to the same spot repeatedly, as this can make it easy for your opponent to anticipate and smash
